website_summaries.verdict: The three Q55SL earclip 'phones emphasize style without sacrificing performance.

customer_reviews.title: I love this style, most comfortable style of headphones.
customer_reviews.text: If you wear headphones as often as me, comfort is the most important thing. My favorite pair of headphones for the past few years have been the Panasonic clip-on earphones. But they fail after a few years because of lack of design quality; they are not built to last. These ones are not quite as comfortable, but they are still pretty comfortable. Their design quality, however, is top notch. I feel like these will last 20 years. And the sound quality is better than the Panasonic clip on ear phones as well. These are overall my new favorite headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: great for what it is
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to game with since I care more about my 'do than I do amazing quality ambient noises, and the earbud style never ever fits me right. they're comfortable at first, don't slide around or pull away at all if you get the clamp on right, but tends to make you sore after a few hours. sound isn't normal headphone or earbud quality to be sure, but it's got bass! that's pretty unique among clip headphones. downside is how fragile the stupid things are. I would never try to sleep with these on for fear of rolling on top of them.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Hipps

customer_reviews.title: Horrible cable design
customer_reviews.text: This headset sounds good, but the cord is very short. An extender cable is included, but it doesn’t connect tightly enough to keep it from coming loose all the time. I like the previous version much better with a non-tangle cord that was long enough not to need an extender. I love the adjustable ear hook and the on-ear design. This set seems to me to be a cheap version of its predicessor, but it costs more.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly carmichael

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother buying these.. Worst pair for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I usually love this style of sony headphones. I’ve purchased 2 other pair of similar style int the past, My guess is that these are knock offs. The cord is stiff and ridiculously short. I can’t run with these as they are way too short to reach my phone. Would give 0 stars if possible
customer_reviews.author: M. C.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, love the earpads!
customer_reviews.text: My last pair like this lasted me 25 years - let's hope these have good longevity too. I love the cord; it has an extension piece you can remove if you want to use it short. The part that fits over the top of your ear works well but could be a little more padded for comfort. Good sound, but could still hear the room around me. I dislike earbuds, so definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amy B

customer_reviews.title: Rift S Sound Fix
customer_reviews.text: If you have an Oculus Rift S these are a great alternative for better sound quality. With the included clip the headphones stay in place and are very light weight and when positioned right are comfortable, but takes some getting use to.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: It is so hard to find this style of headphones nowadays which is a shame because I am unable to wear earbuds. But the pads on one of the headphones on this pair already has a large hole in it after only 2 months of use. The cord + extender also makes no sense as it is much too short without it and much too long with it. I love listening to music when I walk around town but not being able to find good quality headphones to do so is extremely frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Megan B

customer_reviews.title: Best Value Spring-Hinged Clip-On Headphones
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me and hate earbuds and over-the-ear headphones, these are perfect. These aren't nearly as comfy as the MDR-Q22LP or -Q23 models, but they're certainly easier to find and more reasonably priced. I prefer the spring-hinged versions, as I feel they fit more snugly and securely. The cord is nylon-braided, so it's pretty durable; plus the style is easy to store. The sound quality isn't incredible, but that's not my biggest priority. I just want comfortable, portable headphones, and these work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Seanna Hundt

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but does not fit all ears
customer_reviews.text: Very good build and audio quality for the price. I was pleasantly surprised by the range capable by these headphones without distortion. The bass is good but obviously not audiophile worthy. Unfortunately they do not fit my ears properly but they seem to fit on my wife’s fine so I wouldn’t consider it a universal fit.
customer_reviews.author: ikaris

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Not at all lightweight! They don’t stay on very well, especially when you’re moving around, and they hurt because of their weight. The main chord is too short and the extender they provide is way too long. The sound is ok, nothing special. I will definitely not buy these ever again!
customer_reviews.author: Toni Silva

customer_reviews.title: These are Great Head Phones
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have is that the cord is not smooth and at times can be uncomfortable. That is minor. Otherwise they are comfortable and the sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: John Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Sony clip on earphones and find it utterly ridiculous that the older style clip ones were discontinued. These new ones are horrible!!!! I am sooo disappointed. One ear piece was looser than the other and the wire needs to be connected to a longer wire in order for it to be a normal length. Shame on Sony!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Light and loud
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great! Replacement for my old headphones. Light, comfortable, and fit good. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Smilin' Moose

customer_reviews.title: Decent over the ear
customer_reviews.text: Cable thicker which I like less - good over ear comfortable...would buy again unless cam find older Sony over the ear phones.
customer_reviews.author: Darkest Star

customer_reviews.title: Not worth
customer_reviews.text: The cord is insanely short, you will always need the extension good thing they give you one... too bad it's really long, around 1m. So you either get really close to your devices or use the extension and have most of it get in your way or in a roll. The wrap around the ear is bearable for a limited amount of time.The sound is decent/good though.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Duarte

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, really great sound and quality...however for me, it doesnt properly stay on my type of ears.
customer_reviews.author: Kiyoshe

customer_reviews.title: These worked great for me.
customer_reviews.text: I am rebuying a pair of these headphones.(Mine accidentally broke.) I have tried 3 times, within the same price bracket, to replace my current pair and these are SO FAR superior than the newer models available. As mentioned by another reviewer, the cord isn't just a piece of plastic, so it's longevity was relatively amazing. The clip-on ear pieces worked well for me, (but that's coming from someone that those ipod earphones fall right out. ) I guess it just depends on the shape, not size, of your ears. I am buying another pair because I know I can rely on them.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my small ears!
customer_reviews.text: I am unable to wear ear buds. They fall out of my ears. These over the ear phones are great. They're light weight and have great sound. I would recommend these to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Denise A.

customer_reviews.title: Best Inexpensive  earphones
customer_reviews.text: These earphones are the best inexpensive Sony ones to date. They are more comfortable than the old ones and THE CORD DOES NOT GET TANGLED! Sound pretty good but use mostly for books, not music.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Lemon

customer_reviews.title: You only get sound in one ear....
customer_reviews.text: Low quality and low price. I guess it should have been a clue.
customer_reviews.author: vj2400

customer_reviews.title: Pain
customer_reviews.text: The sound on these are quite good, but after two days of use, it's clear that there's just no way to ignore the discomfort from the hard wire that doesn't fit my ear.
customer_reviews.author: Luxury Yacht

customer_reviews.title: D
customer_reviews.text: Wires get tangled when in use and the ear parts dont fit good
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fagiano

customer_reviews.title: Ok Headset. Had higher hopes.
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to get on ears. However, I do have small ears (No, really). The cord is very weird. Not very easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey King

customer_reviews.title: Meet my wife's expectation
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife. It acut above what she was using. The earpiece that hooks over the ear is much more confortable than the Koss she was using. She is very satisfied! Good quality all around.
customer_reviews.author: Roger S.

customer_reviews.title: Only one speaker works
customer_reviews.text: When the extended cable is used only the left speaker works. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: William Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great sound & fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit my ears just right and the sound quality is excellent. Much better than other of this type.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W. Bonfield

customer_reviews.title: Look for something else
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality was good. The one thing that made me regret buying these was that they were uncomfortable. The cord felt weird on my skin and it was uncomfortable. The cord also unwrapped and fell off quickly.
customer_reviews.author: XD m.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these headphones for years and I found that they are only ones that fit on my ears comfortably. I wear at work and during my workouts. The only knock on them is that the black mesh piece tends to get worn out quickly and the wire itself wears down over time. But I attribute that mostly to my daily use of the headphones. They are still a great product and I continue to buy them when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible for exercisers
customer_reviews.text: Glad it's discontinued. I suppose good enough for wearing at a desk, but don't plan on them staying on if you move at all. I wanted them for running & just would not stay put. Not on erg either. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Pushie

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for an upcoming trip which hasn't yet occurred however, I've worn them in my house with the tv volume on. The noise cancelling is probably not as good as traditional headphones but, these are pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Yates

customer_reviews.title: They look cool!
customer_reviews.text: As far as headphones are concerned though, these are pretty mediocre (average) and for the price, they're overpriced. You can get some Skullcandys that sound marginally better for $10 more. If you just want some cool looking phones that look like the ones the Main Character from Persona 3 wears get these.
customer_reviews.author: Nightmaru

customer_reviews.title: Much more comfortable than in ears
customer_reviews.text: I use these for singing with in ears and mics for comfort and they’re perfect
customer_reviews.author: Jennipher

customer_reviews.title: Sony is top quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones very good sound,wire very strong but could be a little more flexible.
customer_reviews.author: james payne

customer_reviews.title: Great bass and sound
customer_reviews.text: Had ordered these yesterday. I love Sony products, they always made great products.
customer_reviews.author: Dkennedy0983

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality good but not as loud as my older sony MDRs
customer_reviews.text: knob at end tangles and pulls my hair so I snapped them off. Sound quality good but not as loud as my older sony MDRs. Sound escapes and can be heard even when I am not wearing them off. Metal of cord extension zapps me each time it contacts my skin so I covered it with scotch tape to insulate. Long cord attaches to left ear which is not as comfortable and reduces the reach to my desktop which is located on my right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !
customer_reviews.text: Old skool but sounds good with movies and especially the music :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Underrated Earphone
customer_reviews.text: sound quality is too good with this price, and my ear doesnt get hurted while wearing it
customer_reviews.author: Tran

customer_reviews.title: 3rd pair.  Replaced with Bluetooth headphones.
customer_reviews.text: I will be buying my third pair soon! First pair lasted 2-3 years as did the second. I mistakenly bought jaybirds and they were awful. If you have trouble with ear buds and have ever growing ears like I do these headphones are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Barbarita

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Its very good headphone. Use it on for my phone to listen music. The cords are pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: For the money, they sound really good. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Sony Mdr Headphones Review
customer_reviews.text: These sony mdr headphones are really great and the sound quality is amazing really loud very clear quality I would definitely recommend this seller's products!
customer_reviews.author: aquarius64

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and my wife loves them. Great sound and bass response
customer_reviews.text: Headphones are perfect . Light weight and my wife loves them
customer_reviews.author: Anthony John

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT match the picture!
customer_reviews.text: The headphones I received appeared nothing like what was pictured here. They are more blue than silver (with a silver bar going over the middle of each earpiece). Also, I need to purchase another headphone extender cord, since the one that came with these headphones is too long to wear around my neck comfortably. Do NOT purchase if you are attempting to match the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Dagger-hime

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than the older model of the same headphones I bought these to replace!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon L

customer_reviews.title: Don't Stay on Ears
customer_reviews.text: These headphones do not stay on while you exercise. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: skip if you please
customer_reviews.text: The cord went crazy after a couple weeks, it's nice they give a cord extension, but the headphones get tangled worse than a snake in a sausage factory.
customer_reviews.author: Idaea

customer_reviews.title: good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: i have purchased these particular headphones again and again. worth the money for sure!! after a while the spring that holds them on gets a little weak though. on my fourth pair in 7 years
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Kane

customer_reviews.title: Me LIKEY
customer_reviews.text: Well I was shocked! On such a great sale and the sound is super nice. I love the ease of the phone call quality to! Only thing I didn't realize is that the headphones are built to allow you to hear things around you which I dont mind but can be annoying
customer_reviews.author: Darkcraft

customer_reviews.title: disappointment
customer_reviews.text: i ordered these because i had read some reviews that claimed they produced high quality sound for this style of headphone. the price was ok, the order process was smooth and they arrived on time. unfortunately, i really dislike their sound and don't use them. only the manufacturer and the reviewers are to blame.
customer_reviews.author: Louis E. Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Work well and look cool
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good and the design is cool. The cord doesn't tangle and has an adjustable clip Stays on ears and doesnt leak sound.
customer_reviews.author: I. Gerasimenko

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these kind of headphones. I've gotten like 5 of them over the past 7 years (one for work, one for home, one for travel, others as replacements). All of them still work, though the cushioning gets broken up after a while. I should figure out how to get cheap replacements for those..
customer_reviews.author: Billy Tetrud

customer_reviews.title: HEAD PHONES ARE JUST O.K.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is decent but nothing special. Comes with an extension cable that on mine did not work but I did not check the extension until after I through the packaging away. For the money they are average.
customer_reviews.author: Big D

customer_reviews.title: Tangle Free Cord is BS
customer_reviews.text: The cord gets just as tangled as any other set of headphones. Worse the cord is slippery enough that my gear ties can't get a decent grip. The base is good though.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Decent Bass and Not Much Else...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use with my Muvo TX while walking and biking. The bass is good, but the midrange and highs sound flat and dull. They also don't fit to the ear very well. Somewhat heavy on the ear. I will stick with the earbuds that came with mp3 player since they sound much better than the Sonys do. Very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bann

customer_reviews.title: what is the use of headphones if the plug is horribly made
customer_reviews.text: I got this headphones, the cord that runs from one to another and to the laptop is very short and does not reach the laptop. So there is an extention cord enclosed. The problem is that the extention cord has a very loose connection with the main cord. You have to be immobile all the time, to the point of holding your breath not to disconnect the cords. Good luck with the item. I could not return it, b/c the sellers stocking fee was high, and he included part of the price in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: kuranka

customer_reviews.title: Génial!
customer_reviews.text: J'ai ce type de casque depuis 7 ou 8 ans et je ne m'en passe plus. C'est mon troisième casque (les autres ne sont pas cassés, ils sont juste usés) Bonne qualité d'écoute, confort et très pratique. Je recommande ces casques à tout mon entourage et également à vous!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Pinches Ears
customer_reviews.text: Solid speaker drivers, however the fit is uncomfortable and tends to pinch ear after wearing for any extended period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Sony MDR-Q55SL/BLUE Clip-on Headphones (Blue) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description: Color:BlueEnjoy fabulous sound while staying aware of outside noises with these Sony Clip-On Open-Air Headphones. A turning adjustment feature provides flexibility so they fit different sized ears. Headphones feature a turbo duct for enhanced bass sound, a tangle-free cord slider with adjustable cord, a 30mm driver unit, a neodymium magnet and a stereo mini-plug.
feature_bullets: Large turbo duct offers deep bass sound
30 mm diameter drive units for delivery of broad frequency range
1.5 meter long, tangle-free cord with slider is adjustable
Neodymium magnets provide maximum energy with minimal size

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars145 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
